text: (makkāvē vāsaya karana kāfirvaruni!) oba soyana jayagrahaṇaya nam, ema jayagrahaṇaya oba idiriyaṭa pæmiṇa æta. (ehet eya obaṭa nova. viśvāsavantayin vana apaṭaya! apima obaṭa erehiva jayagrahaṇaya at kara gattemu. ebævin napura kirīmen) min pasuva hō oba ǣt vuvahot eya obaṭama hon̆daya. min pasuvat oba (napura kirīmaṭa) idiripat vuvahot, apit idiripat vannemu. obagē samūhaya kopamaṇa viśāla vuvada, (eya) obaṭa kisima prayōjanayak at kara dennē næta. mandayat niyata vaśayenma allāh viśvāsavantayin samaga siṭinnēya
